quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), the Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi has lauded the record participation in G20 Janbhagidari event, an initiative of _____________.
options: Ministry of Health & Family Welfare
Ministry of Education
Ministry of Culture
Ministry of Tourism
Ministry of Housing & Urban Affairs

quiz.text: Which of the following represents ‘X’ in the above paragraph?
options: Oil India Limited
IOCL
BPCL
HPCL
ONGC

quiz.text: Dedicated efforts are underway at ‘X’ state-of-the-art R&D Centre in Devanagunthi, Bengaluru for conducting comprehensive research on biofuels. The center's proficient team is evaluating the effects and performance of different blends of ethanol-gasoline, ranging from ________.
options: 5% to 27%
15% to 27%
10% to 27%
10% to 37%
10% to 30%

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), __________ has launched ‘SAGAR SAMRIDDHI’, the online dredging monitoring system in order to accelerate ‘Waste to Wealth’ initiative of the Ministry.
options: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Ministry of Ports, Shipping & Waterways
Ministry of Jal Shakti
Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
Ministry of New and Renewable Energy

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), information has been shared by Ministry of social justice and empowerment regarding the Nasha Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan. NMBA was launched on 15th August 2020 by Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment and is presently being implemented in ________ identified most vulnerable districts.
options: 332
292
272
372
342

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), first Round Table Joint Meeting between India and ‘X’ with the industry and industry associations of both the countries has taken place in New Delhi. ‘X’ is the 11th largest two-way trading partner with total two-way trade valued at US$1.80 bn during 2020. Which of the following is ‘X’?
options: Argentina
Poland
New Zealand
Austria
Peru

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), Minister of Petroleum and Natural Gas has spoken about the ‘Global Alliance on Biofuels’ during India's Presidency of G20 at FIPI’s Oil & Gas Awards-2022 ceremony. India has launched Global Alliance on Biofuels with which of the following countries?
options: Brazil and Russia
Brazil and South Africa
China and South Africa
China and USA
Brazil and USA

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), UNGA (United Nations General Assembly) has elected 5 new non-permanent members of UNSC (United Nations Security Council). Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to UNSC? 1.   It was established in 1948. 2.   It is one of the five principal organs of the United Nations. 3.   Duration of non-permanent members in UNSC is four years. 4.   UNSC has 5 permanent members and 15 non-permanent members.
options: 1 and 2
2, 3 and 4
4 only
None of the above
All of the above

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), the 1st meeting of the joint committee of the India-UAE Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement has concluded successfully. Both sides have agreed to more than double the trade in non-petroleum products to _______ by 2030.
options: USD 100 billion
USD 50 billion
USD 120 billion
USD 150 billion
USD 200 billion

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), during Global DPI (Digital Public Infrastructure) Summit 2023, India has signed MoU with four countries on sharing INDIA STACK. Which of the following is not one of the four countries that have signed an MoU with India?
options: Romania
Armenia
Sierra Leone
Suriname
Antigua and Barbuda

quiz.text: Which of the following organizations have recently (June 2023) signed a new and revised Strategic Framework for Collaboration, designed to build stronger and more resilient health systems and maximise collaboration and impact in support of country, regional and global responses to major communicable diseases?
options: WHO and Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation
WHO and the Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria (the Global Fund)
WHO and Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine
WHO, Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation and the Global Fund
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), the Union Government has released 3rd instalment of tax devolution to State Governments amounting to ₹1,18,280 crore. Maximum devolution has been given to Uttar Pradesh and it is followed by ___________ at 2nd place.
options: West Bengal
Rajasthan
Bihar
Jharkhand
Maharashtra

quiz.text: Under Article _______ of the Constitution of India, the Finance Commission makes recommendations to the President on the division of net tax receipts between the center and the states.
options: 275
324
289
280
356

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), Women 20 Summit has taken place in Mahabalipuram, Tamil Nadu. The theme of this year’s summit is _________________.
options: Women’s Entrepreneurship
Grassroot Women Leadership
Bridging the Gender Digital Divide
Education & Skill Development, and Climate Change Led by Women
Women-Led Development- Transform, Thrive and Transcend

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), four important initiatives have been taken to strengthen 1,514 Urban Co-operative Banks (UCBs) in the country. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to the initiatives?
options: UCBs can now open new branches up to 20 per cent of the number of branches in the previous financial year without prior approval of RBI.
UCBs may provide process for technical write-off as well as settlement with borrowers.
Timeline for UCBs to achieve Priority Sector Lending (PSL) targets extended by two years i.e., up to March 31,2026.
UCBs can designate a Nodal Officer in RBI.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), the ‘X’ has launched its third cohort of four ocean innovators. Supported by Sida and Norad, the third cohort receives financial support to ocean innovators of up to ‘Y’ for two years. Which of the following option will fill the place of ‘X’ and ‘Y’?
options: ‘X’ - United Nations Development Programme; ‘Y’ – USD 250,000
‘X’ - United Nations Environment Programme; ‘Y’ – USD 250,000
‘X’ – World Bank; ‘Y’ – USD 200,000
‘X’ – World Bank; ‘Y’ – USD 250,000
‘X’ - United Nations Development Programme; ‘Y’ – USD 200,000

quiz.text: As per recent (June 2023) news, _________ has launched Mission EVOLVE (Electric Vehicle Operations and Lending for Vibrant Ecosystem) in association with NITI Aayog, __________, Korean-World Bank and Korean Economic Development Cooperation Fund (EDCF) to finance MSMEs in the EV space.
options: State Bank of India; SIDBI
Asian Development Bank; JICA
World Bank; JICA
World Bank; HDFC Bank
SIDBI; World Bank

quiz.text:
Recently (June 2023), India-US Strategic Trade Dialogue (IUSSTD), has been held in Washington D.C. Which of the following was/were the focus area(s) of the dialogue?

1.      Semiconductors

2.      Space

3.      Artificial Intelligence

4.      Defence
options: 1 only
2 only
1 and 4
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), President of India and Serbian counterpart have agreed to set a _________ target for bilateral trade by the end of the decade.
options: one billion euros
two billion euros
five billion euros
half a billion euros
ten billion euros

quiz.text: As per recently (June 2023) released data, ‘X’ country has emerged as 4th largest investor in India in FY23. In the last fiscal, Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) from the ‘X’ country to India jumped over three-fold to USD 3.35 billion from USD 1.03 billion in 2021-22. Which of the following is ‘X’?
options: USA
Mauritius
UAE
Singapore
United Kingdom

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), Global Alliance for Mass Entrepreneurship (GAME) has received in-principal approval from ___________ for designing and structuring a sustainable and scalable NBFC Growth Accelerator Program (NGAP).
options: RBI
SEBI
SIDBI
Ministry of Corporate Affairs
Ministry of Finance and RBI
